<a id="AnimationLibrary"></a>

# AnimationLibrary

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Container for [Animation](Animation.md) resources.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

An animation library stores a set of animations accessible through [StringName](StringName.md) keys, for use with [AnimationPlayer](AnimationPlayer.md) nodes.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Animation tutorial index](../tutorials/animation/index.md)

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Signals

<a id="AnimationLibrary_signal_animation_added"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**animation_added**\ (\ name\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationLibrary_signal_animation_added)

Emitted when an [Animation](Animation.md) is added, under the key `name`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationLibrary_signal_animation_changed"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**animation_changed**\ (\ name\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationLibrary_signal_animation_changed)

Emitted when there's a change in one of the animations, e.g. tracks are added, moved or have changed paths. `name` is the key of the animation that was changed.

See also [Resource.changed](Resource.md#Resource_signal_changed), which this acts as a relay for.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationLibrary_signal_animation_removed"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**animation_removed**\ (\ name\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationLibrary_signal_animation_removed)

Emitted when an [Animation](Animation.md) stored with the key `name` is removed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationLibrary_signal_animation_renamed"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**animation_renamed**\ (\ name\: [StringName](StringName.md), to_name\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationLibrary_signal_animation_renamed)

Emitted when the key for an [Animation](Animation.md) is changed, from `name` to `to_name`.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="AnimationLibrary_method_add_animation"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Error](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Error) **add_animation**\ (\ name\: [StringName](StringName.md), animation\: [Animation](Animation.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationLibrary_method_add_animation)

Adds the `animation` to the library, accessible by the key `name`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationLibrary_method_get_animation"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Animation](Animation.md) **get_animation**\ (\ name\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AnimationLibrary_method_get_animation)

Returns the [Animation](Animation.md) with the key `name`. If the animation does not exist, ``null`` is returned and an error is logged.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationLibrary_method_get_animation_list"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](Array.md)\[[StringName](StringName.md)\] **get_animation_list**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AnimationLibrary_method_get_animation_list)

Returns the keys for the [Animation](Animation.md)\\ s stored in the library.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationLibrary_method_get_animation_list_size"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_animation_list_size**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AnimationLibrary_method_get_animation_list_size)

Returns the key count for the [Animation](Animation.md)\\ s stored in the library.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationLibrary_method_has_animation"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **has_animation**\ (\ name\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#AnimationLibrary_method_has_animation)

Returns ``true`` if the library stores an [Animation](Animation.md) with `name` as the key.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationLibrary_method_remove_animation"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_animation**\ (\ name\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationLibrary_method_remove_animation)

Removes the [Animation](Animation.md) with the key `name`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AnimationLibrary_method_rename_animation"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **rename_animation**\ (\ name\: [StringName](StringName.md), newname\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#AnimationLibrary_method_rename_animation)

Changes the key of the [Animation](Animation.md) associated with the key `name` to `newname`.
